scripts.eas:dev: pnpm dlx eas-cli build --profile development --platform android
scripts.eas:local:android: export EAS_LOCAL_BUILD_SKIP_CLEANUP=1 && export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 && pnpm dlx eas-cli build --local --profile production --platform android
scripts.eas:local:ios: export EAS_LOCAL_BUILD_SKIP_CLEANUP=1 && export NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 && pnpm dlx eas-cli build --local --profile production --platform ios
scripts.eas-build-pre-install:
npm list -g && echo "pnpm version: $(pnpm -v)" && if test "$(echo "$(pnpm -v) 7.4.0" | tr " " "\n" | sort -V | head -n 1)" != "7.4.0"; then
  echo 'Start: update pnpm to latest.' && npm install -g pnpm && npm list -g 
fi
